TITLE
SNODE: Spectral Discretization of Neural ODEs for System Identification

REVIEW SUMMARY
Exceptionally clear and well written paper that demonstrates a strong improvement on an important problem. Novel, timely, and of broad interest.

PAPER SUMMARY
The paper presents a new method for estimating parameters in a neural ODE based on a polynomial representation of trajectories and alternating updates of trajectories and neural net parameters.

CLARITY
The presentation is exceptionally clear.

ORIGINALITY
To my knowledge the proposed method is novel.

SIGNIFICANCE
The paper demonstrates a strong and practically significant improvement in learning, and I expect the results will be of interest to everybody working in this area.

FURTHER COMMENTS

In eq. 2, "X" (blackboard typeface) is not defined. At this point, it is not clear how x(t) is represented.

"trades-off" -> trades off
